tasks.title: Setup Angular 19 Project Foundation
tasks.description: Initialize Angular 19 project with Tailwind CSS, FontAwesome 6.x, and core configuration for the JabÃ³n Arte migration
tasks.details:
1. Create new Angular 19 project using Angular CLI: `ng new jabon-arte --routing --style=scss --strict`
2. Install Tailwind CSS 3.x: `npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer && npx tailwindcss init`
3. Configure tailwind.config.js with custom color palette: #FFF4EC, #DCC7B4, #9CB1A3, #6B4C3B
4. Install FontAwesome 6.x: `npm install @fortawesome/fontawesome-free @fortawesome/angular-fontawesome`
5. Setup TypeScript 5.x configuration with strict mode
6. Configure angular.json for build optimizations
7. Create folder structure: core/, shared/, features/ modules
8. Setup environment files for development and production
9. Configure ESLint and Prettier for code quality
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project builds successfully with `ng build`, check Tailwind classes work, confirm FontAwesome icons render, validate TypeScript compilation with no errors

tasks.title: Build Skin Test Interactive Module
tasks.description: Implement the core skin test functionality with questions, progress tracking, and personalized results
tasks.details:
1. Create SkinTestModule with dedicated routing
2. Implement SkinTestService:
   - Load 5 skin test questions with multiple choice options
   - Calculate skin type based on answers (dry, oily, combination, sensitive)
   - Store results in localStorage for persistence
3. Create SkinTestComponent:
   - Progress bar showing current question (1/5)
   - Question display with radio button options
   - Navigation buttons (Previous/Next)
   - Smooth transitions between questions
4. Implement ResultsComponent:
   - Display calculated skin type
   - Show personalized characteristics
   - Recommend morning and evening routines
   - Suggest specific ingredients
5. Add animations for question transitions
6. Implement restart test functionality
7. Create shareable results feature
tasks.testStrategy: Test all question flows, verify calculation logic accuracy, check localStorage persistence, validate responsive design, test restart functionality

tasks.title: Optimize Performance and Implement Lazy Loading
tasks.description: Implement performance optimizations, lazy loading, and bundle optimization for production
tasks.details:
1. Configure lazy loading for all feature modules:
   - Implement loadChildren for each route
   - Add preloading strategy for critical modules
2. Optimize images and assets:
   - Implement WebP format with fallbacks
   - Add responsive image loading
   - Compress and optimize all static assets
3. Implement OnPush change detection strategy:
   - Update components to use OnPush
   - Optimize component rendering cycles
4. Add service workers for caching:
   - Configure Angular PWA features
   - Implement offline functionality
5. Optimize bundle size:
   - Tree-shake unused dependencies
   - Split vendor and app bundles
   - Configure webpack optimizations
6. Implement performance monitoring:
   - Add Core Web Vitals tracking
   - Monitor loading times and user interactions
tasks.testStrategy: Measure Core Web Vitals (FCP < 1.5s, LCP < 2.5s, CLS < 0.1, FID < 100ms), test lazy loading functionality, verify offline capabilities, check bundle size optimization

tasks.title: Implement Accessibility and SEO Optimization
tasks.description: Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, implement SEO best practices, and finalize production deployment
tasks.details:
1. Implement accessibility features:
   - Add ARIA labels and roles to all interactive elements
   - Ensure keyboard navigation support
   - Implement focus management and skip links
   - Add screen reader support with proper headings
   - Verify color contrast ratios meet WCAG standards
2. SEO optimization:
   - Add meta tags and Open Graph data
   - Implement structured data markup
   - Create XML sitemap
   - Add canonical URLs and proper redirects
3. Final testing and validation:
   - Cross-browser compatibility testing
   - Mobile device testing
   - Accessibility audit with automated tools
   - Performance testing under load
4. Production deployment setup:
   - Configure CI/CD pipeline
   - Setup environment variables
   - Configure domain and SSL certificates
   - Implement monitoring and error tracking
5. Create documentation:
   - User guide for content management
   - Technical documentation for maintenance
   - Deployment and troubleshooting guides
tasks.testStrategy: Run accessibility audit tools (axe, WAVE), test with screen readers, verify keyboard navigation, check SEO scores with Lighthouse, validate cross-browser compatibility, test production deployment
